name: Smiling Jack
descriptions: Smiling Jack is a non-hostile raider merchant who runs his general shop in the Evergreen Mills bazaar in the Capital Wasteland in 2277.

Jack is a master trader and barterer, having set up his business in the bazaar of the raider-controlled Evergreen Mills. He mends the raiders' equipment for them, which keeps him busy and unable to continue modifying and upgrading his pride and joy: The Terrible Shotgun.
Despite being a raider, Smiling Jack holds no animosity towards the Lone Wanderer and is not aggressive unless he is provoked.
He stays at Evergreen Mills bazaar running a general shop.
One can find the Barter Bobblehead in the back room of his shop, on a shelf behind a workbench.
Playstation 3 Xbox 360 Sometimes, it will be impossible to loot Smiling Jack after killing him.

topics.topic_text: I need you to repair my stuff.
topics.response_text: Sure, thing. Just be quick about it before someone sees.

topics.topic_text: What do you have for sale?
topics.response_text: Fresh out of the hands of some mark. Take a look!
Shh. Not too loud. I don't really want people to know that we're doin' business.
Like I told ya man, I don't fuckin' know where it came from. But it freaks the boys out. Some story from a while back, 'bout a stranger with no name.
We're back.  Somebody open up the... Hang on, something' ain't right here.{Raider captain over intercom, returning from a raid. NOTE: add radio/intercom filter.}

conversation.response_text: Just say the word and it's all over. Course then we'd have to skin you alive and eat your liver.

combat.response_text: I'm gonna mount you on my fucking wall!{angry, screaming}
